name: iHRIS
description: iHRIS is a free and open-source software solution that has been used in over 30 countries to more easily collect, maintain, and analyze health workforce data and manage health workforce resources at a ministry of health (MOH), district health offices, and health care facilities.

SDGs.evidenceText: Countries use it to capture and maintain high-quality information for health workforce planning, management, regulation, and training for improved health outcomes..
